Detailed Description

Exception thrown when an I/O error happens during reading or writing on the TCP connection. Contains extra context information about what was going on, which helps in understanding the problem.

See also:
java.net.UnknownHostException

java.net.ConnectException

java.io.IOException

java.net.SocketException
